lead_paragraph: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga beat David Nalbandian, 6-3, 4-6, 6-4, to win the Paris Masters. Tsonga’s second career title gave him the eighth and final spot in the ATP race and a spot in the season-ending Masters Cup next week.
snippet: Jo-Wilfried Tsonga beat David Nalbandian, 6-3, 4-6, 6-4, to win the Paris Masters. Tsonga’s second career title gave him the eighth and final spot in the ATP race and a spot in the season-ending Masters Cup next week.
